definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: fig-tree, (then) fig (√ dub.; Ar. tiynun, Aram. [[תֵּינְתָא]], ti0to0; perhaps Pun. [[תין]] (v. Lzb:385; i.e. [[תְּיֵן]] Eut, v. DHM:VOJ i. 26), As. tittu, a tree; Lag:M i. 58 ff. combines ´[[ת]]: (precariously) with √ (III) [[אנה]] meet opportunely, with ref. to fructifying of fig by another tree, cf. Hom:Aufsätze u.Abh. i. (1892), 100);—abs. ´[[ת]]: Ju Jdg 9:10 +; sf. [[תְּאֵנׇתוֹ]] 1Ki 5:5 +, etc.; pl. [[תְּאֵנִים]] Nu 13:23 +; cstr. [[תְּאֵנֵי]] Je 24:2; sf. [[תְּאֵנֵיכֶם]] Am 4:9;—

fig-tree (ficus carica Post:Flora. 730; Hast. DB, s. v. Tr:NHB.350 M’Lean-Th-Dyer:Ency. Bib., s. v.; cf. Löw:§ 335; oft. + [[גֶּפֶן]]): Ju Jdg 9:10, Jdg 9:11 (in allegory), Am 4:9, Ho 9:10, Na 3:12, 1Ki 5:5, 2Ki 18:31 = Is 36:16, Mic 4:4, Is 34:4, Pr 27:18; ´[[עֲלֵה ת]]: Ge 3:7 (J) fig-leaves, [[חָֽנְטָה פַגֶּיהָ]] ´[[הַתּ]]: Ct So 2:13; coll. Nu 20:5 (JE), Ho 2:14, Je 5:17, Je 8:13, De 8:8, Hb Hab 3:17, Hag 2:19, Zec 3:10, Joe 1:7, Joe 1:12, Joe 2:22, Ps 105:33.

fig, alw. pl.: Nu 13:23 (JE), Je 24:1, Je 24:2, Je 24:2, Je 24:3, Je 24:3, Je 24:5, Je 24:8, Je 29:17 (all symbolic of Judaeans), Je 8:13 ([[בַּתְּאֵנׇה]] ´[[אֵין תּ]]:), Ne 8:13; as medicament, ´[[דְּבֶלֶת ת]]: 2Ki 20:7 = Is 38:21; [[תְּאֵנֵי]] [[הַבַּכֻּרוֹת]] Je 24:2 the figs of early ripeness (cf. Du).
